original_text: And he said to him, ‘Your brother has come, and your father has killed the fattened calf, because he has received him back safe and sound.’
korean_text: 대답하되 당신의 동생이 돌아왔으매 당신의 아버지가 건강한 그를 다시 맞아들이게 됨으로 인하여 살진 송아지를 잡았나이다 하니

sentences.original_text: and your father has killed the fattened calf
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 당신의 아버지는 살진 송아지를 잡았습니다

sentences.original_text: because he has received him back safe and sound
